snippet: Edward Snowden’s leaks do not amount to treason, but he is likely going to be headed to jail regardless.
abstract: Editorial contends that, although Edward Snowden clearly committed some crimes, it is overreaching to charge that he committed treason by revealing to the world how broadly and easily government is collecting phone and Internet records.
lead_paragraph: Edward Snowden’s leaks do not amount to treason, but he is likely going to be headed to jail regardless.

headline.seo: Surveillance: Snowden Doesn’t Rise to Traitor
headline.main: Surveillance: Snowden Doesn’t Rise to Traitor
headline.print_headline: Snowden’s disclosures do not amount to treason
